title: Looking for a team
body: Hey guys, im looking for  an active team willing to accept me, i play far to much league and am sick of dealing with bot lane trolls in solo/duo que ranked, i'd like to join a team allowing bronze elo players, i am well capable of playing against higher elo's but am currently sitting in b5, not to my liking but i cant seem to climb out, maybe its for the best since i cant play every role, my preference in top lane so please consider this if your wanting to recruit me.

replies.body:
hey guys, if us 5 want to start a team? im down to play some team matches now. 
if this kicks off, someone make a team and message/add me :)

I can adc, so if there is a support you know that's decent and can work with me i'd love to join a competitive team.
S4 currently but i was a S2 until i got wrecked by Elo decay and ranked neglect.
So instead of joining a team how bout you make one? :P
hey dude i main support and am a competent jg , i dont rage and have plenty of time at night to play, been looking for a good team for ages but end up with riven mains :( let me know if your keen !

I'm currently Silver 4, I main midlane / support and can also jungle. (i mained jungle for a long time) 
Msg: ADK Midlane, i wouldn't mind joining a competitive team to help build my skills too.
